effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
